thread.title: right in the middle of the city
thread.title_full: right in the middle of the city - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: AmadeusEntertainment
title: right in the middle of the city
text: This Hotel is located in the middle of the City and you can reach all Tourist places in minutes by walking. the Service is good and the rooms clean (just a bit small, but thats NYC, so what did I expect...). only the Service at the lovley rooftopbar (best sight to EmpireStateBuilding) wasn't great at all. But that was maybe a bad Moment after all. We would stay again at this Hotel at our next visit in New York.
